channel.title: World on विचारमञ्जरी (Vichāramañjarī)
channel.description: Recent content in World on विचारमञ्जरी (Vichāramañjarī)

item.title: The Great Outsourcing Shift | How Federal Reserve Policy is Reshaping Global Tech Markets
item.description: Analyzing the shift of IT outsourcing from India to Southeast Asia. Also what even is money exactly?

item.title: The Manufacturing Imperative | Why India's Development Path Diverges from East Asian Success
item.description: A concise look at why India’s service-led growth diverges from the “land → manufacturing → finance” model of East Asia, and why rebuilding a manufacturing base is vital for inclusive prosperity.

item.title: Embracing Pragmatic Self-Interest | A Realistic Approach to Modern Society and Politics
We've sadly forgotten what we knew, Even though that's what has made us
item.description: Sooner or Later, we'll be back to the truth we strayed from, staring right at us.
